text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomadera prati hatyara ksetre pratisodhera bidhana deya hayeche. Sbadhina byaktira upare sbadhina byaktira ksetre, ara dasera upare dasera ksetre, ara narira upare narira ksetre. Tabe yake kichuta reha'i deya haya tara bha'iyera tarapha hate, tahale bicara habe n'yayyabhabe, ara tara prati ksatipurana dite habe udarabhabe. -- Eti tomadera prabhura kacha theke laghu-byabastha o karuna. Kaje'i erapare ye simalanghana karabe tara jan'ya rayeche byathadayaka sasti.
